message.content:
{"id": "21706", 
"title": "Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage", 
"description": "Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage", 
"OB": "The current implementation of BidiUtil in win32 uses Class.forName() to obtain a callback. This can be seen in the line above the suggested fix.", 
"EB": "Instead of using Class.forName(), the line should be changed to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), \"windowProc\", 4);", 
"SR": "Update the line above to use the suggested fix: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), \"windowProc\", 4);"}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '21706', 'title': 'Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage', 'description': 'Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'change the line above to:static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);I haven\'t tested it, but it should do exactly the same thing. '}
